details.arabic_diacless: رب ابن لى عندك بيتا فى الجـنة ونجنى من فرعون وعملهٖ ونجنى من القوم الظٰلمينۙ‏
details.arabic: رَبِّ ابۡنِ لِىۡ عِنۡدَكَ بَيۡتًا فِى الۡجَـنَّةِ وَنَجِّنِىۡ مِنۡ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَعَمَلِهٖ وَنَجِّنِىۡ مِنَ الۡقَوۡمِ الظّٰلِمِيۡنَۙ‏
details.transliteration: rabbiibni lee AAindaka baytan fee aljannati wanajjinee min firAAawnawaAAamalihi wanajjinee mina alqawmi aththalimeen
details.translations: My Lord, build for me near You a house in Paradise and save me from Pharaoh and his deeds and save me from the wrongdoing people.
